GSD.product_version: versions from v4.1 to before v5.17.13
GSD.description:
netfilter: nf_tables: disallow non-stateful expression in sets earlier

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.13 by commit d8db0465bcc4d4b54ecfb67b820ed26eb1440da7, it was introduced in version v4.1 by commit 0b2d8a7b638b5034d2d68f6add8af94daaa1d4cd. For more details please see the references link.
